subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Shabazz Napier swished a 29-footer with six-tenths of a second left in overtime, and Jeremy Lamb scored a career-high 32 points to help visiting Connecticut stun Villanova, 73-70.
snippet: Shabazz Napier swished a 29-footer with six-tenths of a second left in overtime, and Jeremy Lamb scored a career-high 32 points to help visiting Connecticut stun Villanova, 73-70.
